remarks: Define the binomial coefficient operation.  In the literature, this function is often written as a column vector of the two arguments, or with the arguments as subscripts before and after the letter "C". ` ( N _C K ) ` is read " ` N ` choose ` K ` ."  Definition of binomial coefficient in [Gleason] p. 295.  As suggested by Gleason, we define it to be 0 when ` 0 <_ k <_ n ` does not hold.  (Contributed by NM, 10-Jul-2005.)
